\vspace{10pt}

Each question is worth 10 points. For input you can assume that you have
access to 'CinReader reader'.  Do not write a complete program unless you
are instructed to do so by the question.

\vspace{5pt}

\begin{questions}

\question Find the value of $x$:
\begin{align*}
    x^2 &= 4 \\
    \sqrt{x^2} &= \sqrt{4} \\
    x &= 2
\end{align*}

\vspace*{2in}

\begin{solution}
$x = 2$

\end{solution}

\question Find the value of $x$:
\begin{align*}
    x^2 &= 4 \\
    \sqrt{x^2} &= \sqrt{4} \\
    x &= 2
\end{align*}

\vspace*{2in}

\begin{solution}
$x = 2$

\end{solution}

\end{questions}
